chapters.title: Chapter 14: A Vow
chapters.info: Jon Thane, p. 206—Miller of Emond's Field. His mill is at the far east side of the city. When Nynaeve first became Wisdom, he treated her as most would: as a young woman, a girl really, who was new to her station and had not yet earned his respect. Nynaeve barely kept herself from boxing his ears.
